SELECT city_name, city_name_e, city_idx FROM city

SELECT t.city_idx , t.theater_idx , t.theater_name , t.brchNo , s.screen_idx , s.screen_name , m.movie_code , m.movie_nameK , m.movie_runtime , m.movie_rated , sc.sche_date , sc.sche_start_time , screen_total_seat FROM screen s JOIN theater t ON s.screen_theater_idx = t.theater_idx JOIN schedule sc ON s.screen_idx = sc.sche_screen_idx JOIN movie m ON m.movie_code = sc.sche_movie_code WHERE brchNo = #{brchNo}
